changeSet.author: hharera@hharera.net
changeSet.sql: create table property_donation ( id bigint primary key auto_increment, active boolean default true, title varchar(100), description varchar(600), category varchar(50), communication_method varchar(50), status varchar(50), donation_date datetime, donation_expiration_date datetime, rooms int, bathrooms int, kitchens int, people_capacity int, available_from datetime, available_to datetime, user_id bigint, city_id bigint );
